name: Scholar
description: You are thoughtful and focused, curious about "hows" and "whys" where others see only "whats".

name: Creative
description: You are curious and insightful, your mind showing you details and perspectives that others miss.

name: Adventurer
description: You are bold and inquisitive, wanting to explore the world and all its hidden secrets.

name: Spiritualist
description: You are present in the world, seeking not mere facts, but connections and deeper truths.
